mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, HIT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NOTICE_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, HIT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, 0, SYSTIMESTAMP, SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET HIT = HIT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
